page.title: 17PAST EVENTS IN N.FERRIBY.
page.content: { EVENTS IN NORTH FERRIBY DURING THE {SECOND WORLD WAR,}were Saturday concerts at the Oddfellows Hall performed by volunteers.These volunteers also performed for evacuees who were being looked after by A.R.P. officers.Fund raising events were also held one particular event was called Wings for Victory.These helped to raise money to buy new aeroplanes. { CORONATION EVENTS.}On the 2nd of June 1953 it was Queen Elizabeth 2nd's Coronation.The people of Ferriby celebrated in many different ways.The actual Coronation Service, was watched by many people, on huge television sets all over the village.A special garden memorial tree was planted and seats put in the playing field.There was a Drama Pageant,a Garden Party and a Coronation Ball in the Village Hall.
